tool_description: Disposable Temporary Email for QA and etc.
name: Temporary Email
title: Temporary Email

api_list.name: Get Last Email
Get Random Email
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://temporary-email.p.rapidapi.com/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temporary-email.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://temporary-email.p.rapidapi.com/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temporary-email.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
